body:
## Expected Behavior
Cluster HA work and active cluster switch automatically

## Actual Behavior
Nothing happened

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

**Please let me know if my operation is wrong, because I can't find enough operation documents**
**Or tell me how does the HA work**

  1. Deploy NDC in Makefile （active standby other）
  2. register namespace like this:
 Name: default
Id: b909010e-4d3e-41d1-aacc-20bed5afff33
Description:
OwnerEmail:
NamespaceData: map[string]string(nil)
State: Registered
RetentionInDays: 72h0m0s
ActiveClusterName: active
Clusters: active, standby, other
HistoryArchivalState: Disabled
VisibilityArchivalState: Disabled
  3. kill temporal-server active to make active cluster down 

## Specifications

  - Version:latest
  - Platform: MacOS 10.15.6

comments.body: Namespace active / passive settings are currently managed by human, at least for now

title: ActiveCluster can not switch automatically
